pr_title: beta config for EJB timer fail over

timeline.message: Issue #8610 beta config for EJB timer fail over

timeline.bodyText:
Change "Amount of time beyond a task execution's expected start" to "Amount of time beyond the expected start of a task execution"
Change "prior to" to "before"
Change "considered to have been missed" to "considered  missed"
timeline.author: Rwalls1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,14 +40,17 @@ initialPollDelay.desc=Duration of time to wait before this instance might poll t
 jndiName=JNDI name
 jndiName.desc=JNDI name.
 
+missedTaskThreshold=Missed task threshold for fail over
+missedTaskThreshold.desc=Amount of time beyond a task execution's expected start to reserve for running it. Other members are prevented from running the task prior to the expiration of this interval. If the interval elapses without successful execution of the task, then the task execution is considered to have been missed, enabling another member to attempt to run it. This enables fail over.

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the improvements, I've made all of them as you suggested under eeb2529
replies.author: njr-11

timeline.message: Issue #8610 message review fixes to config property descriptions
